entry.data:

COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 5 ABOVE

WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 4 BELOW

NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY

MOSTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS AROUND 20
